name: First Solar, Inc
goal: First Solar is a leading global provider of comprehensive photovoltaic (PV) solar systems which use its advanced thin-film modules. With an installed capacity of over 10 gigawatts worldwide – from mega utility-scale solar plants and commercial & industrial rooftop systems to kilowatt-sized community off-grid systems – the company’s integrated power plant solutions deliver an economically attractive alternative to fossil-fuel electricity generation today. The company’s leadership in renewable energy is a result of its deep expertise and over a decade-long track record in R&D, manufacturing, developing, financing, engineering, constructing or operating the world’s leading sources of sustainable, solar energy. For more information visit www.firstsolar.com
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation
